snippet: Carmelo Anthony has rarely taken responsibility for his team’s failures, preferring to shift blame toward injuries, coaches or the playbook. He needs to mature.
abstract: Howard Beck On Pro Basketball column notes that New York Knicks star Carmelo Anthony has rarely taken responsibility for his team's failures, shifting blame toward injuries, coaches or the playbook; argues that the Knicks will never be an elite team until Anthony matures.
lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony has rarely taken responsibility for his team’s failures, preferring to shift blame toward injuries, coaches or the playbook. He needs to mature.

headline.seo: Carmelo Anthony of Knicks Has Failed Repeatedly in Playoffs
